io.discloader.discloader.entity.message

Interface IMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IMessage>, ISnowflake

    public interface IMessage
extends ISnowflake, Comparable<IMessage>
    Represents a message object on the api
    How to send messages 
     
 IMessage message = iTextChannel.sendMessage((String) content).join();
    Since:
    0.1.2
    Author:
    Perry Berman
    See Also:
    ITextChannel.sendMessage(String, RichEmbed), ISnowflake

      • addReaction

      • addReaction

        CompletableFuture<Void> addReaction(IEmoji emoji)

      • canDelete

        boolean canDelete()
        Checks if the user you are logged in as is able to delete the message. Should return true if either: you are the messsage's author, or you have the Permissions.MANAGE_MESSAGES permission.
        Returns:
        true if you can delete the message, false otherwise.

      • canEdit

        boolean canEdit()
        Only the message's author is able to edit said message.
        Returns:
        true if you are able to edit the message , otherwise false.

      • createdAt

        OffsetDateTime createdAt()

      • delete

        CompletableFuture<IMessage> delete()
        Deletes the message if the loader has sufficient permissions
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with this when successful
        See Also:
        DLUtil.PermissionFlags

      • deleteAllReactions

        CompletableFuture<IMessage> deleteAllReactions()
        Removes all reactions from this message.
        Requires the Permissions.MANAGE_MESSAGES permission.
        Returns:
        A Future that completes with this when successful
        Throws:
        PermissionsException - Thrown if the current user doesn't have the Permissions.MANAGE_MESSAGES permission.

      • getMember

        IGuildMember getMember()
        If the message was sent in a IGuildTextChannel the author's IGuildMember object should be returned. Unless the message was sent by a webhook
        Returns:
        The member who sent the message. possibly null
